name: Block Master: Wood Block Puzzle
description:
Block Master is a funny wood block puzzle game. Playing this game to train your brain. Block Master is a free classic block game. Play this game to relax and get fun.

Block Master is a wooden style block game. Block Master is very fun for adults and children, for any age for any level. You will love Block Master.


*** How To Play Block Master ***
--Drag and droop wood block to place them.
--Fill blocks in a vertical and horizontal line to get point.
--Wooden blocks can not rotated

### Features of the Block Master: On Fire ###

--Free Game
--No need Wifi
-- FREE Block Game
--Beautiful wooden style
--Does not tire your eye
--Very nice eye friend graphics
--Easy play
--Very small install size
--Simple and fun
